verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of My Father <S%G3450><s%> Abodes <S%G3438><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> <S%G1526><s%> <S%G1487><s%> There Are; <S%G1161><s%> Otherwise <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2036><s%> I Would Have Told <S%G302><s%> You; <S%G5213><s%> I Go <S%G4198><s%> To Prepare <S%G2090><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> For You; <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I Go <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> For You <S%G5213><s%> A Place, <S%G5117><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Receive <S%G3880><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Myself, <S%G1683><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Am <S%G1510><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Also 2532 CONJ Ye 5210 P-2NP May Be. 5600 V-PXS-2P
And <S%G2532><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Go 5217 V-PAI-1S Ye Know 1492 V-RAI-2P And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-ASF Way 3598 N-ASF, Ye Know. 1492 V-RAI-2P

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Know Not <S%G1492><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Thou Goest, <S%G5217><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Can We <S%G1410><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Know? <S%G1492><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSF Way 3598 N-NSF And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSF Truth 225 N-NSF And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSF Life. 2222 N-NSF No One 3762 A-NSM Comes 2064 V-PNI-3S To 4314 PREP The 3588 T-ASM 3962 N-ASM Father 1487 COND But 3361 PRT-N ' By 1223 PREP Me. 1700 P-1GS

If <S%G1487><s%> Ye Had Known <S%G1097><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> <S%G1097><s%> Ye Would Have Known; <S%G302><s%> <S%G2532><s%> ' And <S%G575><s%> Henceforth <S%G737><s%> Ye Know <S%G1097><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Seen <S%G3708><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Shew <S%G1166><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Suffices <S%G714><s%> Us. <S%G2254><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> So Long <S%G5118><s%> A Time <S%G5550><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Am I, <S%G1510><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Hast Not Known <S%G1097><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Philip? <S%G5376><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Has Seen <S%G3708><s%> Me, <S%G1691><s%> Has Seen <S%G3708><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father; <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Sayest, <S%G3004><s%> Shew <S%G1166><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father? <S%G3962><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Believest Thou Not <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Am <S%G1473><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Is? <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Speak 2980 V-PAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP ' From 575 PREP Myself 1683 F-1GSM 3756 PRT-N, I Speak Not; 2980 V-PAI-1S 3588 T-NSM But The 1161 CONJ Father 3962 N-NSM Who 3588 T-NSM In 1722 PREP Me 1698 P-1DS Abides 3306 V-PAP-NSM He 846 P-NSM Does 4160 V-PAI-3S The 3588 T-APN Works. 2041 N-APN

Believe <S%G4100><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Am <S%G1473><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1698><s%> Me; <S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Not, <S%G3361><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Themselves <S%G846><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Believes <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Me, <S%G1691><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Do, 4160 V-PAI-1S Also He 2548 D-NSM-C Shall Do, 4160 V-FAI-3S And 2532 CONJ Greater 3173 A-APN-C Than These 5130 D-GPN He Shall Do, 4160 V-FAI-3S Because 3754 CONJ I 1473 P-1NS To 4314 PREP 3588 T-ASM 3962 N-ASM My Father 3450 P-1GS Go. 4198 V-PNI-1S

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> Ye May Ask <S%G154><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Will I Do, <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Be Glorified <S%G1392><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Ye Ask <S%G154><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will Do It. 4160 V-FAI-1S

And <S%G2532><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will Ask 2065 V-FAI-1S The 3588 T-ASM Father, 3962 N-ASM And 2532 CONJ Another 243 A-ASM Paraclete 3875 N-ASM He Will Give 1325 V-FAI-3S You, 5213 P-2DP That 2443 CONJ He May Remain 3306 V-PAS-3S ' With 3326 PREP 5216 P-2GP You 1519 PREP 3588 T-ASM For Ever, 165 N-ASM

The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Truth, <S%G225><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Cannot <S%G1410><s%> Receive, <S%G2983><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Does Not See <S%G2334><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> , Him, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> He Abides, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Shall Be. <S%G2071><s%>
<S%G3756><s%> I Will Not Leave <S%G863><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Orphans, <S%G3737><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Yet <S%G2089><s%> A Little While <S%G3397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> No <S%G3756><s%> Longer <S%G2089><s%> Sees, <S%G2334><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> See <S%G2334><s%> Me : <S%G3165><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Live, 2198 V-PAI-1S Also 2532 CONJ Ye 5210 P-2NP Shall Live. 2198 V-FDI-2P

He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> My Commandments <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Keeps <S%G5083><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Loves <S%G25><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Loves <S%G25><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Shall Be Loved <S%G25><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father; <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will Love 25 V-FAI-1S Him, 846 P-ASM And 2532 CONJ Will Manifest 1718 V-FAI-1S To Him 846 P-DSM Myself. 1683 F-1ASM

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Has Occurred <S%G1096><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> Thou Art About <S%G3195><s%> To Manifest <S%G1718><s%> Thyself, <S%G4572><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> World? <S%G2889><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> My Word <S%G3450><s%> He Will Keep, <S%G5083><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father <S%G3450><s%> Will Love <S%G25><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> We Will Come, <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> An Abode <S%G3438><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Will Make. <S%G4160><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Loves <S%G25><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> My Words <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Keep; <S%G5083><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Mine, <S%G1699><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Who Sent <S%G3992><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>
These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Have Said <S%G2980><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Abiding; <S%G3306><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Paraclete, <S%G3875><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Will Send <S%G3992><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Will Teach <S%G1321><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Bring To Remembrance <S%G5279><s%> Your <S%G5209><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Said <S%G2036><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> I Leave <S%G863><s%> With You; <S%G5213><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> I Give <S%G1325><s%> To You; <S%G5213><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Gives, <S%G1325><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Give 1325 V-PAI-1S 5213 P-2DP To You. 3361 PRT-N Let Not Be Troubled 5015 V-PPM-3S Your 5216 P-2GP 3588 T-NSF Heart, 2588 N-NSF Nor 3366 CONJ Let It Fear. 1168 V-PAM-3S

Ye Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Said 2036 V-2AAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP I Am Going Away 5217 V-PAI-1S And 2532 CONJ I Am Coming 2064 V-PNI-1S To 4314 PREP You. 5209 P-2AP If 1487 COND Ye Loved 25 V-IAI-2P Me, 3165 P-1AS 5463 V-2AOI-2P Ye Would Have Rejoiced 302 PRT That 3754 CONJ I Said, 2036 V-2AAI-1S I Am Going 4198 V-PNI-1S To 4314 PREP The 3588 T-ASM Father, 3962 N-ASM For 3754 CONJ 3588 T-NSM 3962 N-NSM My Father 3450 P-1GS Greater 3187 A-NSM-C Than I 3450 P-1GS Is. 2076 V-PXI-3S

And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I Have Told <S%G2046><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Before <S%G4250><s%> It Comes To Pass, <S%G1096><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> It Shall Have Come To Pass <S%G1096><s%> Ye May Believe. <S%G4100><s%>

No <S%G3756><s%> Longer <S%G2089><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> I Will Speak <S%G2980><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> <S%G2064><s%> For Comes <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of World <S%G2889><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> Ruler, <S%G758><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Nothing; <S%G3762><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Know <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Love <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Commanded <S%G1781><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> I Do. <S%G4160><s%> Rise Up, <S%G1453><s%> Let Us Go <S%G71><s%> Hence. <S%G1782><s%>
